check_permissions_screen.This is the first run of KruxInstaller i: 这是 KruxInstaller 的首次运行。
check_permissions_screen.and it appears that you do not have priv: 而且您似乎没有特权访问权限来执行刷入过程
check_permissions_screen.To proceed, click in the Allow button an: 要继续，请单击"允许"按钮，系统将提示您输入密码
check_permissions_screen.You may need to logout (or even reboot): 您可能需要注销（甚至重启）
check_permissions_screen.and back in for the new group to take ef: 然后重新登录才能使新组生效
check_permissions_screen.Do not worry, this message won't appear: 无需担心，此消息不会再次展示

warning_beta_screen.These are unsigned binaries for the late: 这些是最新和实验性功能的未签名二进制文件
warning_beta_screen.and it's just for trying new things and: 它只是为了尝试新功能和体验反馈。

warning_already_downloaded_screen.Do you want to proceed with the same fil: 是要继续处理相同文件，还是要再次下载？

verify_stable_zip_screen.If you have openssl installed on your sy: 如果您的系统上安装了 openssl
verify_stable_zip_screen.you can check manually with the followin: 您可以使用以下命令手动检查

wipe_screen.disconnect and reconnect device before f: 在重新刷机之前，请断开并重新连接设备

warning_wipe_screen.You are about to initiate a FULL WIPE of: 您的操作将会完全擦除此设备
warning_wipe_screen.Permanently erase all saved data: 永久擦除所有保存的数据
warning_wipe_screen.Render the device non-functional until n: 在重新刷入新固件之前，使设备无法正常工作

warning_before_airgap_update_screen.Before proceeding with the air-gapped up: 在继续进行气隙更新之前
warning_before_airgap_update_screen.Insert a FAT32 formatted SDCard into you: 将 FAT32 格式的 SD 卡插入计算机
warning_before_airgap_update_screen.On the next screen, choose the drive to: 在下一个屏幕上，选择要复制固件的驱动器

warning_after_airgap_update_screen.Insert the SDcard into your device and r: 将SD卡插入设备并重新启动以更新
warning_after_airgap_update_screen.You should see this computed hash on dev: 您应该在设备屏幕上看到此计算出的哈希值
